A D E G H I L M N P R S T U 

H

handleAddPhoto(Event) - Method in class photoAlbum.view.AlbumController
Opens a FileChooser to pick photo files from the machine to add to the album.
handleCancel(Event) - Method in class photoAlbum.view.EditPhotoController
Returns to album window
handleCancel(Event) - Method in class photoAlbum.view.NewAlbumDialogController
Closes new album window and returns to previous window
handleClose(Event) - Method in class photoAlbum.view.SearchController
Closes search window and returns to album window
handleCreate(Event) - Method in class photoAlbum.view.SearchController
Opens a create new album window that creates a new album out of all photos in search list.
handleDeletePhoto(Event) - Method in class photoAlbum.view.AlbumController
Removes photo from the album by removing it from all lists associated with the album.
handleEditPhoto(Event) - Method in class photoAlbum.view.AlbumController
Opens up an edit dialog box with fields to set a caption and tags for the photo or even change the album the photo is in.
handleLast(Event) - Method in class photoAlbum.view.AlbumController
Changes the selected thumbnail to the previous one on the list or if at the beginning, last on the list or if the only one or no thumbnails, does nothing
handleLast(Event) - Method in class photoAlbum.view.SearchController
Selects previous photo in list of photos
handleNewAlbum(Event) - Method in class photoAlbum.view.NewAlbumDialogController
Creates new album
handleNext(Event) - Method in class photoAlbum.view.AlbumController
Changes the selected thumbnail to the one next on the list or if at the end, first on the list or if the only one or no thumbnails, does nothing
handleNext(Event) - Method in class photoAlbum.view.SearchController
Selects next photo in list of photos
handleOk(Event) - Method in class photoAlbum.view.EditPhotoController
Sets designated caption and tags to selected photo.
handleOpen(Event) - Method in class photoAlbum.view.UserController
Opens selected album in album window.
handleOpenSearch(Event) - Method in class photoAlbum.view.AlbumController
Opens a Search window, separate from the main application window where users can use search criteria to find specific photos based on tags or dates
handleRename(Event) - Method in class photoAlbum.view.UserController
Opens window to rename selected album
handleSearch(Event) - Method in class photoAlbum.view.SearchController
Checks if date search or tag search are selected, then performs allotted search.
